languages.text: {n}Голос мандрагоры едва разборчив — существо не привыкло говорить на языке своих темных сородичей.{/n} "Дракн не принс жертву за нши деяния. Дракн должен стать жертвой".

{n}The Mandrake's words are barely comprehensible: the creature is clearly not accustomed to the tongue of its dark kin.{/n} "The Dracn din't offer a scrifice for our dids. The Dracn must become the scrifice."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос мандрагоры едва разборчив — существо не привыкло говорить на языке своих темных сородичей.{/n} "Дракн не принс жертву за нши деяния. Дракн должен стать жертвой".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Mandrake's words are barely legible — the creature is clearly not accustomed to the tongue of their kin.{/n} "The Dracn did not offer a scrifice for our deeds. The Dracn must become the scrifice."
traits.speaker: Mandrake

languages.text: {n}Les paroles de la mandragore sont à peine compréhensibles, la créature n'est manifestement pas habituée à la langue de ses sombres congénères.{/n} « Le dracn a pas fert de scrifice pour nos actes. Le dracn doit être scrifié. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Mandrake's words are barely comprehensible: the creature is clearly not accustomed to the tongue of its dark kin.{/n} "The Dracn din't offer a scrifice for our dids. The Dracn must become the scrifice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les paroles de la mandragore sont à peine compréhensibles, la créature n'est manifestement pas habituée à la langue de ses congénères.{/n} « Le dracn a pas fert de scrifice pour nos actes. Le dracn doit être scrifié. »
traits.speaker: Mandrake

languages.text: {n}你几乎听不清曼德拉的话。很显然，这种生物不太会说他们灵族同类的语言。{/n}“才掘官没有给我们纪品，才掘官必须成为纪品。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Mandrake's words are barely comprehensible: the creature is clearly not accustomed to the tongue of its dark kin.{/n} "The Dracn din't offer a scrifice for our dids. The Dracn must become the scrifice."

traits.locale_text: {n}你几乎听不清曼德拉的话。很显然，这种生物不太会说他们同类的语言。{/n}“才掘官没有给我们纪品，才掘官必须成为纪品。”
traits.speaker: Mandrake

languages.text: {n}マンドレイクの言葉はかろうじて理解できた。 この生き物は、明らかに闇の血族の言語を使い慣れていない。{/n}「ドラクンはワレらのためにイケニエをササげてナイ。ドラクンはイケニエにナルベキダ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Mandrake's words are barely comprehensible: the creature is clearly not accustomed to the tongue of its dark kin.{/n} "The Dracn din't offer a scrifice for our dids. The Dracn must become the scrifice."

traits.locale_text: {n}マンドレイクの言葉はかろうじて理解できた。 この生き物は、明らかに自身の血族の言語を使い慣れていない。{/n}「ドラクンはワレらのためにイケニエをササげてナイ。ドラクンはイケニエにナルベキダ」
traits.speaker: Mandrake

languages.text: {n}Die Worte des Mandraks sind kaum verständlich – die Kreatur ist offensichtlich nicht gewöhnt, die Sprache ihrer dunklen Art zu sprechen.{/n} "Der Dracn hat kein Opfer für unsere Tatn erbracht. Der Dracn muss also ds Opfer sein."
languages.original_text: {n}The Mandrake's words are barely comprehensible: the creature is clearly not accustomed to the tongue of its dark kin.{/n} "The Dracn din't offer a scrifice for our dids. The Dracn must become the scrifice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Worte des Mandraks sind kaum verständlich – die Kreatur ist offensichtlich nicht gewöhnt, die die Sprache ihrer Art zu sprechen.{/n} "Der Dracn hat kein Opfer für unsere Tatn erbrcht. Der Dracn muss also ds Opfer sein."
traits.speaker: Mandrake

languages.text: {n}Las palabras de la mandrágora son prácticamente ininteligibles: es evidente que la criatura no está acostumbrada a la lengua de su sus oscuros parientes.{/n} «Dracn no ofrcio un scrificio por nustros hechs. El dracn debe ser el scrificio».
languages.original_text: {n}The Mandrake's words are barely comprehensible: the creature is clearly not accustomed to the tongue of its dark kin.{/n} "The Dracn din't offer a scrifice for our dids. The Dracn must become the scrifice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las palabras de la mandrágora son prácticamente ininteligibles: es evidente que la criatura no está acostumbrada a la lengua de su especie.{/n} «Dracn no ofrcio un scrificio por nustros hechs. El dracn debe ser el scrificio».
traits.speaker: Mandrake

languages.text: {n}Kankurutan'ın sözcükleri zar zor seçilebiliyor: Yaratığın, kara soydaşlarının diline alışık olmadığı belli.{/n} "Drakn bzim içn krban snmdı. Drakn krban olmlı."
languages.original_text: {n}The Mandrake's words are barely comprehensible: the creature is clearly not accustomed to the tongue of its dark kin.{/n} "The Dracn din't offer a scrifice for our dids. The Dracn must become the scrifice."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kankurutan'ın sözcükleri zar zor seçilebiliyor: Yaratığın, kara soydaşlarının diline alışık olmadığı belli.{/n} "Drakn bzim içn krban snmdı. Drakn krban olmlı."
traits.speaker: Mandrake
